Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav hit the fastest fifty of the tournament in 28 balls
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for just 7 runs
Kuldeep Yadav made a case for a longer run in the XI with a neat spell
India's 181 for 8 was its highest total in the tournament so far
Pre-Game Insights: India had no trouble adapting to conditions in the West Indies
Skipper Rohit Sharma will be pleased with the team’s performance
India’s prospects started to brighten when Suryakumar and Hardik were at the crease
Anticipating the surface to assist turn, left-arm wrist spinner Kuldeep Yadav was brought in to replace fast bowler Mohammed Siraj
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma will be pleased with the team’s performance
A high standard for the rest of the tournament, all of which will be held in the Caribbean, has been set
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rahmanullah Gurbaz was deceived by a slower ball from Bumrah
Hazratullah Zazai was foxed by Bumrah’s cutter
Rishabh Pant was trapped while playing a reverse sweep
Suryakumar planted his foot way outside off-stump to send a low full toss from pacer Azmatullah Omarzai to the square-leg boundary
Hardik Pandya smashed the media room window with a thunderous straight blow
